TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Tang-ma-scye-bu-sun, title = Tang-ma-scye-bu-sun, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tang-ma-scye-bu-sun} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == Tang-ma-s.cye-bu-sun "kamu nu Ing, Thomas Jefferson, 1743 a mihca 4 a bulad 13 a demiad-1826 a mihca 7 a bulad 4 a demiad"saka tulu a Cong-tung nu Amilika "1801 a muhcaan -1809 a mihcaan". namahiza u "teked nu Amilika musakamu" angangan saayaway nu misulit a tademaw, atu Amilaka palekal tu kanatal u sakaliliday. Kalacungtungan u satabakiay a kawaw pasu ci Lu-i-s-an-na a picakay tu lala' "1803 a mihcaan", 1807 a mihcaan la'cus miculu'a hulican, atu aci Lu-i-s atu Ke-la-ke a piazih "1804- 1806 a mihcaan" uzip mala migingkiway tu cen-ce, ci Cye-bu-sun mitelung tu ku-tyen paydang ku nizateng atu kapulung a nizateng, nipahecekan "Wi-ci-ni-ya kiwkay paydang a hulic" "Virginia Statute for Religious Freedom, 1779,1786 ), uyni a hulic anuayaw mala nu Amilika a huluc tu sakacaca nisumadan nisabaluhayay angangan a nisulitan, Cye-bu-sun-min-cu, "Jeffersonian democracy" namahini a singangan ciniza. 1792 a mihcaan ci Cye-bu-sun patizeng a mikelid tu min-cu-kung-he-tang "ayzaay nu ayaway a min-cin-tang". "(Virginia Statute for Religious Freedom, 1779, 1786) . Cye-bu-sun na u saka tusa nu Wi-ci-niya-cow a cow-cang "1779 a mihcaan-1781 a mihcaan", saayaway nu Amilika a kow-u-cin "1789 a mihcaan-1793 a mihcaan", atu saka tusa nu Amilika a bu-Cong-tong "1797 a mihcaan-1801 a mihcaan. 1800 a mihcaan ci Cye-bu-sun pakazemec tu malaliday nu Amilika nu sakatulu a Cong-tong ci Ya-tang-s, namahiza nikilidan niza a cen-tang mikuwan tu Amilika katukuh sepat tu cacay a lasubu a mihcaan, katukuh cen-tanng niza tu 1824 a mihcaan katukuh i kaliwasakan. . Caay ku cen-ce dada; ku kawaw, ci Cyee-bu-sun mahiza sa u migingkiw tu kaluk, migingkiw tu palumaan, migingkiw tu sapatizeng, migingkiwa tu lalekalan tu cudad, migingkiw tu kasumamadan a tuud, migingkiw tu saasipan, migingkiw tu mi-ma, migingkiw tu sapidetek atu kasumamadan nu mauzipayay sye-ke a mitesekay, u mitesekay nu misulitay, mitesekay a binkusi atu adidic'ay a ti-cin, uyza aca nu Wi-ni-ci-ya talakaway cacudadan nu patizengay a tademaw. hini sa ku katuuday ciniza hatini mala Cong-tongay nu Amilika, u sitenengay. i 1962 a mihcaan cacay a pipalabangan 49 kunitakus tu tademaw nu sikawlahay tu Now-pey-al palabangan tu sandeb. Ye-han. Kan-nay-ti musuayay tu haminay nu tumunaw syaka nu sitinengay a tademaw musakamu, "pitapal aku ayza a sandebay kalacapu nu Pay-kung sakatuuday a tenengay atu sitinengay a tademawan-hakay miliyas tawyaay a mihcaan ci Cye-bu-sun tataytay itini mukan hawsa caay pisausi."I 2005 a mihcaan Amilika i wangle palekal tu pisingkiw a kawaw "u siicelangay amilika" ci Cye-bu-sun masingkiw tu saiicelangay nu Amilika tu 12 a tademaw. duduc ku katahkal hawsa u zu-lye-li ku hahizaen, 1743 a mihca 4 a bulad 2 a demiad Cye-bu-sun lecuh i Wi-ci-ni-ya a A-al-pow-ma-al cacay kitizaan cacay aenengan pangangan han Sa-te-wi-al a kalukan, nika kilul i mauzipay hawsa sumad au Ke-li-kaw-li-li, u pilecuhan ni Cye-bu-sun i 4 a bulad 13 a dimiad. ci Cye-bu-sun leccuh i kakitaan cumelakay ku luma', 10 ku calkakaan u sakatulu ciniza "tatusa ku mahaludutay" ngangan nu wama ci Pi-te. Cye-bu-sun, u palumaan pahabayay mikawa aca tu miditekay, wina ci Cen.lan-taw-bu "Jane Randolph", ci Ay-sya-mu.lan-taw-bu "Isham Randolph" atu ci Cen.low-cye-s "Jane Rogers" tataynaan a wawa, Pi-te. Cye-bu-sun "Peter Jefferson" u lalumaan. Ay-sye-mu ju iIng-kow-lin-tun-cen-tung-sa a Sa-te-wi-al tinsikiw a kiwkay "Shadwell Parish church" a malaacawa. Ci Tang-ma-s. Cye-bu-sun a babalaki u matenesay mueneng a Wi-ci-ni-ya nu mabulawan a luma'. (Isham Randolph)與珍·羅傑斯(Jane Rogers)之女,彼得·傑弗遜(Peter Jefferson) (Shadwell Parish church)結的婚.湯瑪斯· . ci Pi-te.Cye-bu-sun matuduh ku luma' zikuz, hamin nu luma' mabulal tayza I Ye-ci-lin "Edge Hill". uyni a buyu i 17 lasubu a mihcaan hawsa miedap ci Ye-han.Li-pow-ney palahad tu cen-ce a kawaw a Ing-kow labu malalais saayaway a kalalais a singangan, .Cye-bu-sun a sabana Lu-si "Lucy" mikadabu ci Ca-al-s.Li-pow-ney.Lu-i-s "Charles Lilburne Lewis", cacay a tatamaan a wawapangangan han Li-pow-ney, u sabama ni Lan-taw-bu cacay a tatamaan a wawa pangangan han aca tu ci Li-pow-ney. (Charles Lilburne Lewis), . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinenngan

== kakiliman == Tang-ma-s.cye-bo-son "kamo no Ing, Thomas Jefferson, 1743 a mihca 4 a bolad 13 a demiad-1826 a mihca 7 a bolad 4 a demiad"saka tolo a Cong-tong no Amilika "1801 a mohcaan -1809 a mihcaan". namahiza o "teked no Amilika mosakamo" angangan saayaway no misolit a tademaw, ato Amilaka palekal to kanatal o sakaliliday. Kalacongtongan o satabakiay a kawaw paso ci Lo-i-s-an-na a picakay to lala' "1803 a mihcaan", 1807 a mihcaan la'cos micolo'a holican, ato aci Lo-i-s ato Ke-la-ke a piazih "1804- 1806 a mihcaan" ozip mala migingkiway to cen-ce, ci Cye-bo-son mitelong to ko-tyen paydang ko nizateng ato kapolong a nizateng, nipahecekan "Wi-ci-ni-ya kiwkay paydang a holic" "Virginia Statote for Religioos Freedom, 1779,1786 ), oyni a holic anoayaw mala no Amilika a holoc to sakacaca nisomadan nisabalohayay angangan a nisolitan, Cye-bo-son-min-co, "Jeffersonian democracy" namahini a singangan ciniza. 1792 a mihcaan ci Cye-bo-son patizeng a mikelid to min-co-kong-he-tang "ayzaay no ayaway a min-cin-tang". "(Virginia Statote for Religioos Freedom, 1779, 1786) . Cye-bo-son na o saka tosa no Wi-ci-niya-cow a cow-cang "1779 a mihcaan-1781 a mihcaan", saayaway no Amilika a kow-o-cin "1789 a mihcaan-1793 a mihcaan", ato saka tosa no Amilika a bo-Cong-tong "1797 a mihcaan-1801 a mihcaan. 1800 a mihcaan ci Cye-bo-son pakazemec to malaliday no Amilika no sakatolo a Cong-tong ci Ya-tang-s, namahiza nikilidan niza a cen-tang mikowan to Amilika katokoh sepat to cacay a lasobo a mihcaan, katokoh cen-tanng niza to 1824 a mihcaan katokoh i kaliwasakan. . Caay ko cen-ce dada; ko kawaw, ci Cyee-bo-son mahiza sa o migingkiw to kalok, migingkiw to palomaan, migingkiw to sapatizeng, migingkiwa to lalekalan to codad, migingkiw to kasomamadan a tood, migingkiw to saasipan, migingkiw to mi-ma, migingkiw to sapidetek ato kasomamadan no maozipayay sye-ke a mitesekay, o mitesekay no misolitay, mitesekay a binkosi ato adidic'ay a ti-cin, oyza aca no Wi-ni-ci-ya talakaway cacodadan no patizengay a tademaw. hini sa ko katooday ciniza hatini mala Cong-tongay no Amilika, o sitenengay. i 1962 a mihcaan cacay a pipalabangan 49 konitakos to tademaw no sikawlahay to Now-pey-al palabangan to sandeb. Ye-han. Kan-nay-ti mosoayay to haminay no tomonaw syaka no sitinengay a tademaw mosakamo, "pitapal ako ayza a sandebay kalacapo no Pay-kong sakatooday a tenengay ato sitinengay a tademawan-hakay miliyas tawyaay a mihcaan ci Cye-bo-son tataytay itini mokan hawsa caay pisaosi."I 2005 a mihcaan Amilika i wangle palekal to pisingkiw a kawaw "o siicelangay amilika" ci Cye-bo-son masingkiw to saiicelangay no Amilika to 12 a tademaw. dodoc ko katahkal hawsa o zo-lye-li ko hahizaen, 1743 a mihca 4 a bolad 2 a demiad Cye-bo-son lecoh i Wi-ci-ni-ya a A-al-pow-ma-al cacay kitizaan cacay aenengan pangangan han Sa-te-wi-al a kalokan, nika kilol i maozipay hawsa somad ao Ke-li-kaw-li-li, o pilecohan ni Cye-bo-son i 4 a bolad 13 a dimiad. ci Cye-bo-son leccoh i kakitaan comelakay ko loma', 10 ko calkakaan o sakatolo ciniza "tatosa ko mahalodotay" ngangan no wama ci Pi-te. Cye-bo-son, o palomaan pahabayay mikawa aca to miditekay, wina ci Cen.lan-taw-bo "Jane Randolph", ci Ay-sya-mo.lan-taw-bo "Isham Randolph" ato ci Cen.low-cye-s "Jane Rogers" tataynaan a wawa, Pi-te. Cye-bo-son "Peter Jefferson" o lalomaan. Ay-sye-mo jo iIng-kow-lin-ton-cen-tong-sa a Sa-te-wi-al tinsikiw a kiwkay "Shadwell Parish chorch" a malaacawa. Ci Tang-ma-s. Cye-bo-son a babalaki o matenesay moeneng a Wi-ci-ni-ya no mabolawan a loma'. (Isham Randolph)與珍·羅傑斯(Jane Rogers)之女,彼得·傑弗遜(Peter Jefferson) (Shadwell Parish chorch)結的婚.湯瑪斯· . ci Pi-te.Cye-bo-son matodoh ko loma' zikoz, hamin no loma' mabolal tayza I Ye-ci-lin "Edge Hill". oyni a boyo i 17 lasobo a mihcaan hawsa miedap ci Ye-han.Li-pow-ney palahad to cen-ce a kawaw a Ing-kow labo malalais saayaway a kalalais a singangan, .Cye-bo-son a sabana Lo-si "Locy" mikadabo ci Ca-al-s.Li-pow-ney.Lo-i-s "Charles Lilborne Lewis", cacay a tatamaan a wawapangangan han Li-pow-ney, o sabama ni Lan-taw-bo cacay a tatamaan a wawa pangangan han aca to ci Li-pow-ney. (Charles Lilborne Lewis), . malalitin to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinenngan
